content: तुंग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} High, elevated, tall, lofty, prominent; जलनिधिमिव विधुमंडलदर्शनतरलिततुंगतरंगं <ls>Gīt. 11</ls>; तुंगं नगोत्संगमिवारुरोह <ls>R. 6. 3</ls>, <ls n="R.">4. 70</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 48</ls>; <ls>Me. 12</ls>, <ls n="Me.">64.</ls> {@--2@} Long. {@--3@} Vaulted. {@--4@} Chief, principal. {@--5@} Strong, passionate. --गः {@--1@} A height, elevation. {@--2@} A mountain. {@--3@} Top, summit. {@--4@} The planet Mercury. {@--5@} A rhinoceros. {@--6@} The cocoa-nut tree. {@--7@} The aphelion of a planet. {@--8@} (Fig.) A throne. {@--9@} A wise man. {@--10@} An epithet of Śiva. --गं The stamina of the lotusblossoms.
